replies.msg: 粒u 買9400f 平400

PUBG PC Recommended System Requirements

Operating System: 64-bit Windows 10
Processor: Intel Core i5-6600k / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet Connection
Storage: 30 GB available space

6代i5 i5 / 1代R5 可以用i3 9100F取代
GTX1060 3GB 可以用GTX1650 Super取代

所以我地可以得出以下List
(貪方便用珍寶出list, 千祈唔好去珍寶買)
Intel Core i3-9100F HK$ 620
ASRock B365M Pro4 HK$ 600
G.SKILL DDR4 2400MHz 16GB Kit (2x8GB) HK$ 530
MSI GTX1650 SUPER VENTUS XS 4GB GDDR6 HK$ 1430
ADATA XPG SX6000 Lite M.2 2280 SSD HK$ 340
ANTEC VP500P Plus 500W 80Plus Power Supply HK$ 290
ANTEC VSK3000B-U3 (黑色) Micro ATX Tower Case HK$ 219

總數: HK$ 4029

然後我都唔知可以再cut
